text: Hello young trainer my name is Professor Oak$ the leading Pokemon researcher in Kanto
Today is the day I give new trainers their first Pokemon
All I ask in return is that you take this Pokedex and catch as many Pokemon as you can
There was a time I would have done that myself$ but I'm not as young as I once was
Between you and me$ I can't even remember my grandson's name anymore
Anyhow$ now it's time to pick a Pokemon and begin your adventure!
Which one would you like?
Ahh Bulbasaur$ an excellent choice!
I hope you can handle Charmander$ they tend to be quite hot-headed!
Squirtle is a very popular choice for new trainers!
Pikachu$ that's a unique choice!
Eevee is an excellent choice$ it is a very versatile Pokemon!
Take good care of it!
I heard Professor Oak has been looking for you
Why don't you visit him and see what he wants
Many years ago there were less than 200 species of Pokemon in the Kanto region
Now there are over 400 different Pokemon to be found!
It is a great time to be a Pokemon scientist!
It is important to take good care of your Pokemon
If you are nice to them and take good care of them$ they may perform better in battle!
Hi$ I just caught my first Pokemon and I want to use it! Let's battle!
Have you been to Viridian City?
I've heard the Gym Leader there is the strongest in all of Kanto.
I can't seem to remember his name though...
Our daughter left recently to begin her Pokemon journey...
She was sending us a letter almost every week to let us know how she was doing...
But the past month we haven't got any letters from her and I'm starting to get worried.
Do you think you could keep an eye out for her on your journey? Her name is Cassie.
Last we heard she was heading to Pewter City to fight the Gym Leader there.
Anyway$ if you hear anything$ let me know. I just want to know she is safe.
One day$ I'm going to start my own Pokemon journey just like my sister!
What could have happened to her?
Hi$ I know what you're thinking. This house is too big for one person...
But the price was right and it's so close to my work at Oak's Lab!
Hey$ can I let you in a secret? I wish I could go live somewhere else further from work.
I'm always running into people from work on the weekends and it's just kinda weird y'know?
Hi$ my friend just helped me catch this Ralts. But I won't need help to defeat you!
Hey$ have you seen my brother Gary?
No? Okay well he wanted me to tell you that he already has his pokemon and he wants to battle.
I think he's on his way to Viridian City if you want to find him. Good luck!
Hey$ it sure took you long enough to get here!
Your pokemon look almost as weak as their trainer!
All right$ let's battle!
Ha! Maybe I won't go so easy on you next time.
Smell ya later!
I just caught this super rare Pokemon! Let's battle!
Hey$ I haven't had a chance to fight with my first Pokemon yet!
Wanna battle?
Check out my adorable Pokemon!
Hi$ welcome to the Pokemon Center!
Your pokemon will be restored to full health.
Thanks$ we hope to see you again!
Hey$ yeah sure you can come into my house without knocking.
Uhh$ sorry. I didn't mean that.
I've just been a little on edge lately what with all the team rocket guys around.
*sigh*
I haven't been able to see my family in months.
They only live in Celadon$ but GioCorp's been giving me so many hours I barely have time to sleep.
Hello there.
Have you seen the GioCorp Mine? There's some cool pokemon there.
Team Rocket guards the entrance during work hours$ but you could probably sneak in at night.
I can't believe I paid three months salary for this Magikarp...
Hmm?
Who are you?
Ah$ figures. Most the travellers we get around here are also trainers.
You should go see Professor Oak to get a Pokemon before wandering into wild grass.
Sorry$ you can't enter wild grass without a Pokemon.
I like turtles.
